Class RushModeHandler

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.mode.RushModeHandler
public class RushModeHandler extends Object
Handles Rush-40 mode-specific logic including line count tracking and milestones. Rush-40 mode challenges players to clear a target number of lines as fast as possible.

  • Constructor Summary

    Creates a Rush-40 mode handler.

  • Constructor Details

    • RushModeHandler

      public RushModeHandler(int targetLines, GameConfig config)
      Creates a Rush-40 mode handler.
      Parameters:
      targetLines - the target number of lines to clear (e.g., 40)
      config - the game configuration (reserved for future use)

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the Rush-40 timer.

    • handleLinesCleared

      public boolean handleLinesCleared(ClearRow clearRow)
      Handles line clearing in Rush-40 mode. Updates progress and checks for completion and milestones.
      Parameters:
      clearRow - the result of line clearing (null if no lines cleared)
      Returns:
      true if a new milestone was reached, false otherwise

    • getMilestoneMessage

      public String getMilestoneMessage()
      Gets the milestone message for the last reached milestone.
      Returns:
      the milestone message (e.g., "10 Lines Cleared!"), or null if no new milestone

    • getLinesCleared

      public int getLinesCleared()
      Gets the current number of lines cleared.
      Returns:
      the lines cleared so far

    • getTargetLines

      public int getTargetLines()
      Gets the target number of lines to clear.
      Returns:
      the target lines

    • isCompleted

      public boolean isCompleted()
      Checks if the Rush-40 goal has been completed.
      Returns:
      true if target lines have been reached

    • getCompletionTimeSeconds

      public double getCompletionTimeSeconds()
      Gets the completion time in seconds.
      Returns:
      completion time in seconds, or -1.0 if not completed

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets Rush-40 state for a new game.
